metadata.title: CVE-2020-10087 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: GitLab before 12.8.2 allows Information Disclosure. Badge images were notbeing proxied, causing mixed content warnings as well as leaking the IPaddress of the user.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
